title: My game keeps crashing and i am loading in very slowly since 6.19 Anyone else having this problem?
body: Hi my name is UmbreonSpots and I am in Bronze 1. Since the patch 6.19 my game has sometimes been crashing and i load very slowly now. I used to have no troubles with crashing or slowly loading in 6.18 or the patches before. Is anyone else having this problem? If so do you know how to fix it?

replies.body: When the game crashes, do you get a specific error message or behavior? With a bit more info, I can give you specific steps to take in order to resolve this.
It just crashes me out in the loading screen sometimes and gives me the reconnect option.

Gotcha. So in that case, it sounds like your client is having a hard time establishing a solid link to the game server. This is often caused by local network settings that just don't play nicely with League. I strongly recommend you work through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step in resolving this.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
